entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:48 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or drizzle this morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
